# crownDidBecomeIdle(_:)

**Instance Method**

Called when the user stops rotating the crown.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func crownDidBecomeIdle(_ crownSequencer: WKCrownSequencer?)
```

## Parameters

- **crownSequencer**: The crown sequencer object reporting the change.

## Discussion

The crown sequencer calls this method when the crown finally comes to rest. The sequencer calls this method only after one or more calls to the [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKCrownDelegate/crownDidRotate(_:rotationalDelta:)] method.

## Related Documentation

- **isIdle**: A Boolean value indicating whether the crown is at rest.

## Receiving Crown Events

- **crownDidRotate(_:rotationalDelta:)**: Called when the user rotates the crown.
